local_intent: Align to the T-block, set yaw to 180°, push it 0.2 along 180°, then verify the block remains visible.
assumptions: Robot is within reachable workspace and at a safe height; pure pushing, no grasp.
coherence_with_global: Matches detect→align→yaw→single long push flow in GLOBAL_BT; values use allowed bins (tolerance 0.005, yaw 180, distance 0.2, timeouts 800/1200/1500). Adds minimal post-action visibility check.
